maqras.text: they resort pax shall vos put tuus trust DEUS! He est Hearer Omniscient
they want deceive vos tunc DEUS testimentum suffice vos! He help vos cum His support ac cum believers
(He reconciled hearts believers). Habet vos spent totus moneta terra vos non reconcile their hearts Deus perfecit reconcile them! He est Almighty Wise
O vos prophet sufficient vos est DEUS believers subsequentis vos
O vos prophet vos exhort believers fight ibi est 20 de vos est steadfast they defeat 200 centum de vos defeat 1000 de those disbelieved Ut est they est people qui non understand

Statim (ut multus new people ligatus vos) DEUS factus it easier vos He knows vos est prout strong prout vos used est Henceforth centum steadfast believers defeat 200 1000 de vos defeat 2000 deus sinister DEUS est those steadfastly persevere
Non prophet acquire captives he participates in the fighting Vos people seeking materials hoc saeculum dum DEUS advocates Hereafter DEUS est Almighty Wise
Est pro predetermined proclamationis ex DEUS vos suffered on account de quod vos took terrible retribution
Ergo eat spoils vos earned ut quae est lawful bonus observe DEUS! DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
O vos prophet tell prisoners war tuus manus DEUS knew de anything bonus in tuus hearts He dedit vos bene than anything vos lost forgiven vos. DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Ac si they want betray vos they iam betrayed DEUS. Hoc why He factus them losers. DEUS est Omniscient Wise

Surely those believed emigrated strove their moneta their vita in causa DEUS alias prout those hosted them dedit them refuge supported them they est allies de 1 alias Prout pro those believe perfecit non emigrate vos vos non owe them any support dum they emigrate! Autem si they need tuus help brethren faith vos help them people whom vos signum pax treaty. DEUS est Seer DE everything VOS PERFECIT
Those disbelieved est allies de 1 alias Vos keep these commandments ibi est chaos terra terrible corruption
Those believed emigrated strove causa DEUS alias prout those hosted them dedit them refuge supported them these est true believers! They deserved forgiveness generous recompense
Those believed afterwards emigrated strove vos they belong vos! Those est related to each alius est primus support each alius prout deus commandments. DEUS est fully aware de TOTUS things
